content: I'm excited to try out those Italian recipes and cookbooks. I think I'll start with the Spaghetti Aglio e Olio, it sounds quick and easy to make. Also, I'll definitely check out those online resources for more inspiration. Now, I've been thinking about planning a short trip to the nearby city for a weekend getaway. Do you have any tips or recommendations for planning a quick trip, such as finding affordable accommodations and things to do?
